chunks.en: Were back-to-work red envelopes given out?

chunks.zh: 从没听说过有开工红包😂
chunks.en: I've never heard of back-to-work red envelopes 😂

chunks.zh: 外企，听老员工说没有开工红包，哎
chunks.en: Foreign company, heard from senior employees that there are no back-to-work red envelopes, sigh.
Randomly grabbed a few tens of yuan.

chunks.zh: 随机抢了两块半，看别人也只是几块钱，当喝公司一瓶可乐了
chunks.en: Randomly grabbed two and a half yuan, seeing that others also only got a few yuan, consider it as drinking a bottle of Coke from the company.

chunks.zh: 我都怕一早到公司门口 铁匠把门 倒闭了 那还敢想红包。
chunks.en: I'm even afraid that the company would have already closed down; how would I even dare to think about red envelopes.

chunks.zh: 同事发了两个，一个 10 块。在等老板的开工红包。不过我们是微型公司，就十几个人，没有对比意义
chunks.en: Colleague sent two, one was 10 yuan. Waiting for the boss's back-to-work red envelope. But we are a micro-company, just a dozen people, so there's no point in comparing.

chunks.zh: 年终都没有，开工红包更不可能了
chunks.en: Didn't even have an end-of-year bonus, a back-to-work red envelope is even more impossible.

chunks.zh: 请了一天假，晚一天到公司，就没了开工红包了。
chunks.en: Took a day off, arrived at the company a day late, and there was no back-to-work red envelope.
What is a back-to-work red envelope?

chunks.zh: 现在都这样了吗  开工红包都这么多人没有。
chunks.en: Is this how it is now? So many people don't have back-to-work red envelopes.

chunks.zh: 发了，部门经理发的，10 块钱
chunks.en: Received it, given by the department manager, 10 yuan.
500 + a bottle of Wangzai (旺仔 milk drink).
